mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE( ( SELECT chat_seq FROM ( SELECT chat_seq FROM chat_member WHERE member_email IN (#{email1}, #{email2}) GROUP BY chat_seq HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT member_email) = 2 ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ), 0 ) AS chat_seq FROM dual
select count(*) from chat_member where chat_seq = #{chat_seq} and member_email = #{email}
